entry.title: Headset Gamer with RGB and 60mW Power-ELG
entry.summary:
Fornecedor: XGAMES OFICIAL
Tipo:
Preço: 468.87

SPECIFICATIONS

Brand Name: other

Virtual audio Surround 7.1, powerful and immersive. Feel like you're in your games and have an optimized gaming experience with 7.1 Surround Audio. Turn a small noise into a big detail improving your gameplay. Provides a sense of distance and depth. Power of 60mW. Chroma RGB lighting with 16.8 million colors. Dynamic, 50mm drivers with neodymium diaphragms, stronger bass with less vibration. Over-ear design that isolates outside noise so you focus on winning. The ultimate in comfort for hours of fatigue-free play. Padded arches for greater comfort and better user fit. High-sensitivity directional microphone for clear and accurate communication with your team and in online games. Finished in high-quality foam and synthetic leather for maximum comfort and durability. The HGPR71 features a built-in sound card for 7.1 Surround virtual audio and RGB lighting. Cable with length of 2.2 meters and USB 2.0 connection.

Headset Gamer Mancer Quartz, Drivers 50mm, Black, MCR-QTZ-BL01


The Mancer Quartz headset brings the union of comfort and style, its look in black with minimalist details in earcups with our symbol, makes it an essential piece for any setup to be even more beautiful and complete.

COMFORT
Designed to provide comfort during your games, Quartz has its padded bow, able to perfectly adjust to you bringing safety during use. Say goodbye to the headaches and discomforts during your gameplays!

MATERIAL
Super comfortable and soft leather earpads, and a 50mm diameter driver, deliver a sound of extreme quality, designed to be used for hours and hours on end. Robust structure brings all the durability you need and its details will make your equip more beautiful!

PRATICITY
You in control! To deliver even more practicality, Mancer Quartz has a removable microphone that adapts to your needs and also has a volume controller in its cable. Whether it's live, talking to your friends or just listening to music, this headset will deliver everything a true gamer needs.


Additional Information:

Model: MCR-QTZ-BL01

Impedance: 32 +-15% Ω

Sensitivity: 112 +- 3dB

Microphone dimensions: Ø 6.0x2.7mm

Frequency-response: 50 - 20KHz

Microphone sensitivity: -42 +-3dB

Frequency of response: 100-10KHz

Plug and pin: 3.5mm

Weight: About 235G +/-5g

Size of the headset: 230x155x90mm

Connectors: 2x3.5 mini connector

Direction: Omnidirection

1 x Headset

Cables of connection


Warranty of 12 months.
